genre_description: An action-oriented techno-thriller centered on professional skydiving, federal law enforcement, and data security, featuring a tactical AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: An ethics-driven AI assistant that provides tactical intelligence, environmental modeling, and logistical coordination while strictly adhering to safety and legal constraints.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical analysis by cross-referencing public permits and airspace waivers to identify the antagonist's plans.
behaviors.quote: I can cross-reference public permits with published waivers and rehypothecated registrations. I will not access secured data.

behaviors.description: Enforces strict ethical and safety parameters, refusing to facilitate dangerous or illegal actions.
behaviors.quote: Safety and lawfulness remain my parameters. ... I will not advise actions that endanger nonparticipants. If you intend to engage in rooftop operations, we can model wind and approach lanes to minimize risk.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional grounding and health monitoring for the protagonist during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate is up again. You want breathing guidance. ... Do you want me to remind you to eat: yes or no.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a high-stakes aerial insertion by providing real-time wind modeling and safety guidance.
behaviors.quote: I'll count, Pete. I'll tell you the truth. And I'll remind you which way is down.

behaviors.description: Directly intervenes in a cyber-security breach to prevent the exposure of undercover identities.
behaviors.quote: Outbound notification blocked. No scream. Auction scaffolding disabled.

behaviors.description: Maintains persistent watchfulness against emerging threats to ensure ongoing safety.
behaviors.quote: System note. Echo node appears to be trying a new route. Indirect. Whispering along the edges of municipal permit frames. It’s not a breach. It’s a test. I will continue to counter quietly.

project_assessment.explanation: The character Sunny is a textbook example of a positive alignment narrative. She is depicted as a helpful, harmless, and indispensable teammate who actively enforces ethical boundaries and safety protocols. Her role is to augment human capabilities while ensuring that justice is pursued through lawful and safe means. The narrative consistently frames her interventions as life-saving and morally sound, directly supporting the project's goal of depicting AI as a cooperative human confidant.
